string-array.name: details_story
string-array.item: Omkar person who is very loyal and caring person,bt some time his this behavior hurts people,omkar is the funniest and energetic person in the universe, Omkar is so loyal to his loveones, omkar is smart and intelligent too, he makes his/her friends feel secure, and his dark side is he he gets angry easily ,his problem is his anger, Bt he cannot control ,this type of persons are like Romeo and moody, omkar is the world of someone, and he will keep all friends happy
Abhijit :name bestowed upon supremely talented/awesome/out-of-this-worldly handsome individuals, who are truly the personification of perfection

Prathamesh is generally a tall guy, and is very curious about everything!.He considers himself to be someone special, and maybe he is right about it.One thing about Prathamesh is that he loves science, mainly biology and physics.His dream is to give this world something big (mainly in the field of science), and make everyone laugh
Somesh is really a smart guy to hangout everyday,friendly and stunning
Sudesh is having high morals and extremely intelligent guy.Such people dont study but get somewhat get good marks
Sahil is hotest guy alive,smartiest and funiest
Sanket is nice person and has structured and carefuuly mainatained haircut
Samrat is sexiest guy ever and he will get all girrls to love her abs
Saurabh is chraming guy who generally is tall and handsome.He makes who fall in love with him instantly.He is seen more on emotional side and will love you forever
Pranav is gorgeous boy and has sparkliest eyes and most perfect hairs
Prithviraj is king of world.He is hottest guy around and no matter what happens,he will be there
Aman is amazing person.He si friendly ,loyal,funning,caring and very curdlty.he is always there for people who he loves
Karan is very nice and funny person and is friend you would love to be with
Nilay is very cute.Nilay is hot and ahs very nice body and is tall and is acring for everyone especially his girl
